name: Trubbish

evolution.description: Trubbish can evolve into Garbodor at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Trash Bag Pokémon. The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker flinches.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Held items cannot be stolen or knocked away from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: This Pokémon deals damage to an attacker equal to half of the damage received when knocked out by a melee move.
